 _Trava NFT Bridge is a new feature about to be released by Trava Finance. This blog post will explain why we need it, how it works and its mechanism._
NFT Bridge is one of soon to be released features by Trava Finance
NFTs are unique digital assets that are typically created and traded on a specific blockchain network, particularly in this case — Trava Knights. However, as NFT ecosystem expands, there is a need for interoperability between different blockchain networks to allow for seamless movement across platforms.
If you’ve been paying attention to our latest AMA, you might already know that Trava Finance is about to release many new features and one of which is the NFT Bridge. It will help solve this problem by enabling the transfer of Limited Knight NFTs from one blockchain to another, increasing the utility of the Knights, and opening new opportunities for creators, collectors, and users.
 
Why do we need the Trava NFT Bridge?
Knight NFT is one of the outstanding unique products of Trava Finance, besides Trava Tickets, especially towards the goal of Decentralized Marketplace. Therefore, it will be a big regret if its operation and value are only encapsulated in our ecosystem as it is now.
Usually, exchange across different blockchains without a bridge is possible, but it would be very expensive and time-consuming. That’s why Trava Finance decided to open NFT Bridge, which allows users to move their Knights between chains. By doing this, there are more chances for our products to participate in the wide-open market on the Ethereum network. This will also increase the utilization and value of Trava Knight NFTs.
Trava NFT bridge still has some limitations, but we will definitely give it more uses in the future. For now, it can only support transfers to Ethereum and with Limited Knights:
 * Aleister — Eye of the Twelve.
 * Medivh — Ambassador of Techfian Principality.
 * Sir Kuana — Commander of TraDAO.
 * Dame Johanna — Shield of the Twelve.
 * Limited TR-A Valor-1.


 
How does it work?
As mentioned, the Trava NFT bridge will give you the ability to transfer your Limited Knight NFTs between BNB and Ethereum chains. The transition happens on the bridge seamlessly, you only need to pay a fee and follow some particular rules for it to work.
When transferring, simply, your Limited Knight NFT(s) on the BSC mainnet will be locked, and the same one will be minted on Ethereum. When you want to transfer it back, the Limited Knight on Ethereum will be burned, and the locked version will be released. For more clarity on how it works, you can follow the detailed mechanism explanations below:
 
How does it work?
As mentioned, the Trava NFT bridge will give you the ability to transfer your Limited Knight NFTs between BNB and Ethereum chains. The transition happens on the bridge seamlessly, you only need to pay a fee and follow some particular rules for it to work.
When transferring, simply, your Limited Knight NFT(s) on the BSC mainnet will be locked, and the same one will be minted on Ethereum. When you want to transfer it back, the Limited Knight on Ethereum will be burned, and the locked version will be released. For more clarity on how it works, you can follow the detailed mechanism explanations below:

Transfer your Limited Knight NFT(s) from Source Chain to Destination Chain
After starting this process, you will have to connect to the wallet that has the Knight NFT that you want to transfer, note that currently this bridge only supports Unique Collection. The transfer then goes through a verification process, which includes checking if the sender (you) is the owner of the NFT collection and has sent the required bridge fee.
When those things are finished, your transfer will be processed and the bridge will lock your Limited Knight NFT, then retrieve all the necessary information about you and your assets. It then is encoded into a message, which will be sent by the MainBridge to a queue serving as a way to track transactions and handle any potential issues, such as missed events or system failures.
Upon receiving the message, the Bridge checks its validity and emits an event containing the bridge data, which is then captured and verified by a Relayer. If the bridge data is deemed valid, the Relayer will sign the bridge data and send it back to you along with the signature, allowing the transfer process. Your Limited Knight NFT will be locked from this moment onward, and you won’t be able to access it from the Source Chain (BNB chain).
Then, to get your NFT from the Destination Chain, you will have to prove it using the information received. It’s only usable once and remains valid for 2 months from the time of signing, and anyone can utilize it. However, the Limited Knight will be minted just for the person whose address has been specified. If everything is valid and the data has not been used before, the Bridge will mint the Limited Knight NFT for you (the intended receiver).
 
How does it work?
As mentioned, the Trava NFT bridge will give you the ability to transfer your Limited Knight NFTs between BNB and Ethereum chains. The transition happens on the bridge seamlessly, you only need to pay a fee and follow some particular rules for it to work.
When transferring, simply, your Limited Knight NFT(s) on the BSC mainnet will be locked, and the same one will be minted on Ethereum. When you want to transfer it back, the Limited Knight on Ethereum will be burned, and the locked version will be released. For more clarity on how it works, you can follow the detailed mechanism explanations below:

Transfer your Limited Knight NFT(s) from Destination Chain to Source Chain
Basically, you will have to go through the similar process as above, only with some minor differences. The first is that after verifying specific criteria, instead of locking, the Limited Knight NFT on the Destination Chain will be burned. The process includes:
 * Verifying whether you are the rightful owner of the NFT collection.
 * Checking if it was originally bridged from the Source Chain.
 * Confirming the bridge fee is paid.


Once the Limited Knight NFT on Ethereum has been successfully burned, another message will be encoded just as mentioned in the previous section. You will go through a similar process, and then your Limited Knight NFt will be released from the locked state.
**_About Trava.Finance_**
Trava Finance is the world’s first decentralized marketplace for cross-chain lending.
While existing approaches provide only one or a few lending pools with their own parameters such as borrow/supply interest rate, liquidation threshold, Loan-to-Value ratio, or a limited list of exchangeable cryptocurrencies, Trava Finance offers a flexible mechanism in which users can create and manage their own lending pools to start a lending business.
Trava Finance is deployed on the BSC and allows for lending with BSC tokens first; we then enable cross-chain lending with various tokens on Ethereum and other blockchain networks.

Introduction To The rTRAVA Bridge
 
** _What is the rTRAVA Bridge, and why do we need it?_**
There are many blockchain networks and cryptocurrencies that use different blockchain technologies. As in the Trava Lending pool, there are over 15 types of cryptocurrency on three chains, consisting of BSC, Fantom, and Ethereum.
Usually, exchange across different blockchains for cryptocurrency is possible without a cross-chain bridge. However, it is very expensive and time-consuming to do so. That’s why we need a bridge that enables users to transit their tokens easier and faster at a low cost.
For now, Trava.finance has already opened a bridge that allows users to transfer their TRAVA tokens from Fantom to BSC and vice versa. However, given the increase of the rTRAVA utilities, we are pleased to introduce the rTRAVA bridge that helps our users to exchange rTRAVA tokens from Fantom and Ethereum to BSC.
 
**What benefit does the rTRAVA bridge bring to the whole ecosystem?**
As mentioned, users can transit rTRAVA tokens from Fantom and Ethereum to BSC easier and cheaper with the rTRAVA bridge.
By doing that, there are more chances for them to participate in various programs on the BSC network, especially in locking their tokens in the Trava governance vault to attain voting power and rewards.
To be more specific, in Trava Governance, the decision-making power of users corresponds with the volume of TRAVA, rTRAVA, and LP TRAVA/BNB they lock in the Trava Governance vault.
At first, the voting power attained from locking TRAVA and rTRAVA is the same. However, there will be some differences between these two that locking rTRAVA will get more significant power in the future. Thus, locking rTRAVA seems to be a smart choice to improve the influence in the ecosystem quickly.
Nevertheless, the Trava Governance vault is implemented on the BSC platform that stops users from locking rTRAVA tokens.
By implementing the rTRAVA bridge, users now can effortlessly transfer rTRAVA from Ethereum and Fantom to BSC, lock them then attain both rewards and decision-making power.
The rTRAVA Bridge
 
**How does it work?**
As mentioned, the rTRAVA bridge makes the token transition process quicker and effortless. When transit your rTRAVA tokens through the bridge, you only need to pay a small amount of bridge fee and follow some particular rules.
Two options relating to the parameters of the rTRAVA bridge are shown in the table below. Thus, a voting snapshot will soon be opened for our community to choose which one should be officially applied.
 1. _Delay time_**:** The period you need to wait for implementing the transaction.
 2. _Bridge Fee_ : The fee (in TRAVA) you need to pay for each transaction using the rTRAVA bridge.

**What is voting power?**

DAO stands for “Decentralized Autonomous Organization”. Establishing the development of Trava DAO ensures Trava’s team mission:
 * A self-governed protocol, powered by the strength of the Trava community & secured smart contracts.
 * The growth of Trava Ecosystem, a decentralized finance platform with stable and outstanding products.


With that mission in mind, Trava DAO will be implemented & takes over centralized processes gradually with the growth of the ecosystem.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.

**Governance Process**
The governance process consists of 2 continuous processes: off-chain & on-chain.
 * Off-chain process:


In the off-chain process, anyone in the Trava community can raise their opinions and discuss ideas of how the protocol can improve by creating **TRC - Trava Request for Comments** on the Trava Forum.
After an idea is well-formed, a community member can follow our template for **TIP - Trava Improvement Proposal** and post on the forum for details feedback. We recommend off-chain voting (powered by snapshot.org) to gain exposure and rough consensus from the community to increase the chance of succeeding in the on-chain process.
When a TIP gets to its final version, the **DAO Committee** is in charge of the review process and officially proposes on-chain.
 * On-chain process:


When a TIP is proposed on-chain, it becomes transparent on the public blockchain; anyone possessing voting power can directly **vote for or against** this proposal.
After the voting period, a TIP will be **queued and executed** by the public.
The **Security Advisory Board acts as a guardian** to prevent malicious actions and security exploits in this process.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.

**Governance Authority**
In governance version 1, the DAO will have authority over the Trava lending protocol. The community will have to agree on any significant changes or updates through the on-chain process.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.

**Governance Power**
To gain governance power, holders need to lock their Trava or rTrava token in exchange for the veTRAVA token, which holds voting power. This vote locking mechanism encourages users who show a solid commitment to the protocol with more governance power and incentive.

 _Trava NFT Bridge is a new feature about to be released by Trava Finance. This blog post will explain why we need it, how it works and its mechanism._
NFT Bridge is one of soon to be released features by Trava Finance
NFTs are unique digital assets that are typically created and traded on a specific blockchain network, particularly in this case — Trava Knights. However, as NFT ecosystem expands, there is a need for interoperability between different blockchain networks to allow for seamless movement across platforms.
If you’ve been paying attention to our latest AMA, you might already know that Trava Finance is about to release many new features and one of which is the NFT Bridge. It will help solve this problem by enabling the transfer of Limited Knight NFTs from one blockchain to another, increasing the utility of the Knights, and opening new opportunities for creators, collectors, and users.
 
Why do we need the Trava NFT Bridge?
Knight NFT is one of the outstanding unique products of Trava Finance, besides Trava Tickets, especially towards the goal of Decentralized Marketplace. Therefore, it will be a big regret if its operation and value are only encapsulated in our ecosystem as it is now.
Usually, exchange across different blockchains without a bridge is possible, but it would be very expensive and time-consuming. That’s why Trava Finance decided to open NFT Bridge, which allows users to move their Knights between chains. By doing this, there are more chances for our products to participate in the wide-open market on the Ethereum network. This will also increase the utilization and value of Trava Knight NFTs.
Trava NFT bridge still has some limitations, but we will definitely give it more uses in the future. For now, it can only support transfers to Ethereum and with Limited Knights:
 * Aleister — Eye of the Twelve.
 * Medivh — Ambassador of Techfian Principality.
 * Sir Kuana — Commander of TraDAO.
 * Dame Johanna — Shield of the Twelve.
 * Limited TR-A Valor-1.


 
How does it work?
As mentioned, the Trava NFT bridge will give you the ability to transfer your Limited Knight NFTs between BNB and Ethereum chains. The transition happens on the bridge seamlessly, you only need to pay a fee and follow some particular rules for it to work.
When transferring, simply, your Limited Knight NFT(s) on the BSC mainnet will be locked, and the same one will be minted on Ethereum. When you want to transfer it back, the Limited Knight on Ethereum will be burned, and the locked version will be released. For more clarity on how it works, you can follow the detailed mechanism explanations below:
 
How does it work?
As mentioned, the Trava NFT bridge will give you the ability to transfer your Limited Knight NFTs between BNB and Ethereum chains. The transition happens on the bridge seamlessly, you only need to pay a fee and follow some particular rules for it to work.
When transferring, simply, your Limited Knight NFT(s) on the BSC mainnet will be locked, and the same one will be minted on Ethereum. When you want to transfer it back, the Limited Knight on Ethereum will be burned, and the locked version will be released. For more clarity on how it works, you can follow the detailed mechanism explanations below:

Transfer your Limited Knight NFT(s) from Source Chain to Destination Chain
After starting this process, you will have to connect to the wallet that has the Knight NFT that you want to transfer, note that currently this bridge only supports Unique Collection. The transfer then goes through a verification process, which includes checking if the sender (you) is the owner of the NFT collection and has sent the required bridge fee.
When those things are finished, your transfer will be processed and the bridge will lock your Limited Knight NFT, then retrieve all the necessary information about you and your assets. It then is encoded into a message, which will be sent by the MainBridge to a queue serving as a way to track transactions and handle any potential issues, such as missed events or system failures.
Upon receiving the message, the Bridge checks its validity and emits an event containing the bridge data, which is then captured and verified by a Relayer. If the bridge data is deemed valid, the Relayer will sign the bridge data and send it back to you along with the signature, allowing the transfer process. Your Limited Knight NFT will be locked from this moment onward, and you won’t be able to access it from the Source Chain (BNB chain).
Then, to get your NFT from the Destination Chain, you will have to prove it using the information received. It’s only usable once and remains valid for 2 months from the time of signing, and anyone can utilize it. However, the Limited Knight will be minted just for the person whose address has been specified. If everything is valid and the data has not been used before, the Bridge will mint the Limited Knight NFT for you (the intended receiver).
 
How does it work?
As mentioned, the Trava NFT bridge will give you the ability to transfer your Limited Knight NFTs between BNB and Ethereum chains. The transition happens on the bridge seamlessly, you only need to pay a fee and follow some particular rules for it to work.
When transferring, simply, your Limited Knight NFT(s) on the BSC mainnet will be locked, and the same one will be minted on Ethereum. When you want to transfer it back, the Limited Knight on Ethereum will be burned, and the locked version will be released. For more clarity on how it works, you can follow the detailed mechanism explanations below:

Transfer your Limited Knight NFT(s) from Destination Chain to Source Chain
Basically, you will have to go through the similar process as above, only with some minor differences. The first is that after verifying specific criteria, instead of locking, the Limited Knight NFT on the Destination Chain will be burned. The process includes:
 * Verifying whether you are the rightful owner of the NFT collection.
 * Checking if it was originally bridged from the Source Chain.
 * Confirming the bridge fee is paid.


Once the Limited Knight NFT on Ethereum has been successfully burned, another message will be encoded just as mentioned in the previous section. You will go through a similar process, and then your Limited Knight NFt will be released from the locked state.
**_About Trava.Finance_**
Trava Finance is the world’s first decentralized marketplace for cross-chain lending.
While existing approaches provide only one or a few lending pools with their own parameters such as borrow/supply interest rate, liquidation threshold, Loan-to-Value ratio, or a limited list of exchangeable cryptocurrencies, Trava Finance offers a flexible mechanism in which users can create and manage their own lending pools to start a lending business.
Trava Finance is deployed on the BSC and allows for lending with BSC tokens first; we then enable cross-chain lending with various tokens on Ethereum and other blockchain networks.

Introduction To The rTRAVA Bridge
 
** _What is the rTRAVA Bridge, and why do we need it?_**
There are many blockchain networks and cryptocurrencies that use different blockchain technologies. As in the Trava Lending pool, there are over 15 types of cryptocurrency on three chains, consisting of BSC, Fantom, and Ethereum.
Usually, exchange across different blockchains for cryptocurrency is possible without a cross-chain bridge. However, it is very expensive and time-consuming to do so. That’s why we need a bridge that enables users to transit their tokens easier and faster at a low cost.
For now, Trava.finance has already opened a bridge that allows users to transfer their TRAVA tokens from Fantom to BSC and vice versa. However, given the increase of the rTRAVA utilities, we are pleased to introduce the rTRAVA bridge that helps our users to exchange rTRAVA tokens from Fantom and Ethereum to BSC.
 
**What benefit does the rTRAVA bridge bring to the whole ecosystem?**
As mentioned, users can transit rTRAVA tokens from Fantom and Ethereum to BSC easier and cheaper with the rTRAVA bridge.
By doing that, there are more chances for them to participate in various programs on the BSC network, especially in locking their tokens in the Trava governance vault to attain voting power and rewards.
To be more specific, in Trava Governance, the decision-making power of users corresponds with the volume of TRAVA, rTRAVA, and LP TRAVA/BNB they lock in the Trava Governance vault.
At first, the voting power attained from locking TRAVA and rTRAVA is the same. However, there will be some differences between these two that locking rTRAVA will get more significant power in the future. Thus, locking rTRAVA seems to be a smart choice to improve the influence in the ecosystem quickly.
Nevertheless, the Trava Governance vault is implemented on the BSC platform that stops users from locking rTRAVA tokens.
By implementing the rTRAVA bridge, users now can effortlessly transfer rTRAVA from Ethereum and Fantom to BSC, lock them then attain both rewards and decision-making power.
The rTRAVA Bridge
 
**How does it work?**
As mentioned, the rTRAVA bridge makes the token transition process quicker and effortless. When transit your rTRAVA tokens through the bridge, you only need to pay a small amount of bridge fee and follow some particular rules.
Two options relating to the parameters of the rTRAVA bridge are shown in the table below. Thus, a voting snapshot will soon be opened for our community to choose which one should be officially applied.
 1. _Delay time_**:** The period you need to wait for implementing the transaction.
 2. _Bridge Fee_ : The fee (in TRAVA) you need to pay for each transaction using the rTRAVA bridge.


**_Examples for calculating the bridge fee:_**", "image_ids": [], "filename": null, "url": "https://blog.trava.finance/introduction-to-the-rtrava-bridge-678b349767ae?source=collection_home_page----75e285c42203-----62-----------------------------------", "rrf_score": 0.07142857142857142 }, { "content": "**How to participate in Governance?**
Trava users need to lock their Trava/rTrava for veTRAVA token to participate in the on-chain governance process. Then, after gaining your voting power, go to the Vote UI in the Governance Portal. You can now vote on active proposals, and before that, don’t forget to read its discussion on the forum carefully.
 

**What is voting power?**
The number of voting power you receive from veTRAVA depends on your locked balance & unlock time. The minimum locking time is one week, and the maximum locking time is four years.
Your voting power gradually decreases as your escrow tokens approach their lock expiry. The graph on Locker UI from Governance Portal illustrates the decrease process.", "image_ids": [], "filename": null, "url": "https://docs.trava.finance/governance/voting", "rrf_score": 0.06515151515151515 } ] }

Aug 26, 2021", "image_ids": [], "filename": null, "url": "https://blog.trava.finance/?source=post_page---post_publication_info--79146094a347---------------------------------------", "rrf_score": 0.08333333333333333 }, { "content": "# Introduction To veTRAVA Marketplace
Published in
3 min readFeb 9, 2023
Share
Introduction to veTRAVA Marketplace
 _Along with the launch of Trava Governance, veTRAVA Marketplace brings Trava Finance to the next level of “Decentralized” by enabling peer-to-peer exchanging voting power, fostering the decision-making power of the whole ecosystem._ # What Is veTRAVA And Its Benefits?
 ## What is veTRAVA?
To fulfill the “decentralized” part of the Trava Decentralized Marketplace, we launched Trava Governance, based on the Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) model, to give users decision-making power. In this case, veTRAVA, in the form of NFT, represents this power and is determined by the time and amount of locked tokens (as they show your commitment toward the future of Trava Finance).
With the implementation of the Trava Governance Vault, users can lock their TRAVA, rTRAVA, and LP TRAVA/BNB into this vault to receive a certain amount of veTRAVA representing their powers: the more veTRAVA you own, the higher your voting power in the Trava ecosystem. ## The Benefits Of Owning veTRAVA
The key value of veTRAVA is its representative of users’ power and their commitment to the project. As a result, in the long term, users who own veTRAVA can receive significant benefits:
 * Deciding on crucial parameters such as LTV, risk parameters, etc., in the lending pools (Trava Lending Pool and Users-owned Pools).
 * Receiving share profit coming from the fee charged by borrowers
 * Receiving boosting rewards **in rTRAVA** by providing liquidity and holding veTRAVA at the same time.
 * Earning TRAVA reward: the APR will be revealed soon.


As mentioned, veTRAVA is utilized as a form of NFT. For now, it can only be available for those who lock their token into the Governance Vault. However, it will be exchanged peer-to-peer with the launch of veTRAVA Marketplace. # veTRAVA Marketplace: Overview
As its name suggests, the veTRAVA marketplace is for users to buy and sell their veTRAVA. It means they can freely exchange their voting power. The main reason we came up with this idea is to optimize users’ experience, bringing them as much freedom as possible. It’s the “Decentralization” we are heading for.
Besides bringing more freedom to users, veTRAVA Marketplace increases liquidity for veTRAVA and thus benefits both sellers and buyers. In more detail, buyers can buy veTRAVA (voting power) easily on Marketplace and then earn voting power immediately. In this case, the remaining locking time will be more flexible, no longer limited to a particular period set in the Governance Vault. When it comes to sellers, they can easily utilize crypto assets in a more liberal way and get benefits from it. ## The Influences of veTRAVA Marketplace
veTRAVA Marketplace is an important feature that contributes to the development of Trava Governance. As mentioned above, users who hold many veTRAVA will have a crucial role in the decision-making process of the Trava Finance ecosystem. The veTRAVA holders can alternate the voting results, and through the Marketplace, users can buy or sell the voting power with others.
With the fact that users can trade their voting power to each other, anyone in the ecosystem will have a chance to vote for the changes they want to make in Trava Finance. The more users have veTRAVA, the more voting power is distributed, and users will be given the full power to make the decisions that can affect the Decentralized Lending Marketplace, which will elevate the decentralized side of Trava Finance’s ultimate goal.", "image_ids": [], "filename": null, "url": "https://blog.trava.finance/introduction-to-vetrava-marketplace-c9092a0c51c8", "rrf_score": 0.08333333333333333 }, { "content": "## Introduction Alpha Version of Trava Token Health
 ### What is Token Health?

Aug 26, 2021", "image_ids": [], "filename": null, "url": "https://blog.trava.finance/?source=post_page---byline--63d315146b69---------------------------------------", "rrf_score": 0.07142857142857142 }, { "content": "##
**Introduction to Vote Locking mechanism**
Trava & rTrava holders can vote-lock their tokens into the Trava Governance to receive veTRAVA, which holds voting power. The longer they lock, the more voting power they possess. Vote locking allows you to vote in governance and receive rewards from special incentive programs. ##
**What is veTRAVA?**
veTRAVA stands for voting escrow Trava. It is an ERC721 token that acts as evidence of your locking token in the governance module. Every time users create a new lock, they receive a veTRAVA token, storing their locked balance, unlock time, and rewards amount.
The longer you lock your tokens, the more voting power you have (and the bigger incentive you can earn). For example, you can vote lock 1,000 TRAVA/rTRAVA for a year to have 250 voting power. Each token locked for four years is equal to 1 voting power.
The number of voting power you will receive depends on your locked balance & unlock time. 
The minimum locking time is one week, and the maximum locking time is four years.
Your voting power gradually decreases as your escrow tokens approach their lock expiry. The graph on Locker UI from Governance Portal illustrates the decrease process. ##
**What can we do with veTRAVA?**
While holding veTRAVA, you can vote for proposals to change the protocol with your voting power and earn rewards from incentive programs. Currently, veTRAVA holders will earn weekly rewards emission in Trava based on their voting power percentage. There will be proposals to enable sharing fees from protocol or boost rewards in the lending pool in the near future to enrich the veTRAVA incentive program. ##
**Why do we need veTRAVA?**
Firstly, veTRAVA represents the vote locking mechanism, which helps the protocol focus on encouraging ones who show strong commitment.
Secondly, veTRAVA is designed as an ERC721 token, which opens a future secondary marketplace to avoid the decrease of liquidity on the market because of locking the Trava token. ##
**How can I get veTRAVA?**
You can go to our Locker UI in Governance Portal to create a new veTRAVA lock.
Here is the link to our user guide.

 _On July 2nd, 2024, Trava Finance organized an AMA on_ _to discuss the development of_** _TravaGPT_** _and the incentive campaign of this product “_** _Easy Integration, Abundant Rewards_** _”._
With the honored presence of Mr. Duke Nash, Tech Lead of TravaGPT, this AMA meeting has led attendees to dive into the product TravaGPT and its incentive program. The event was hosted by Ms. Tilly, Community Mod, and covered 3 main sections:
1️⃣ Information about TravaGPT V3.0.
2️⃣ The ongoing incentive program for TravaGPT.
3️⃣ Answers community questions.
Let’s go through the discussions in this AMA event in this article.
 
Information about TravaGPT V3.0
**First Question: We can see that Trava Finance is increasingly pushing AI chatbot — TravaGPT. So can you introduce this product to new users and explain its significance in Trava ecosystem to everyone, please?**
For those who are new here, TravaGPT is an AI chatbot that helps enhance user experience and lets you navigate DeFi more easily. This product has been launched in Trava Finance since the beginning of 2024, and as of now, it has developed almost completely.
As the world is focusing on AI technology to unlock more potential benefits, Trava Finance also looks ahead to apply advanced technology in our product to provide an unlimited user experience. TravaGPT is born with the mission to become a personal assistant in blockchain investment in Trava ecosystem.
That means, you just need to ask TravaGPT to do everything in our ecosystem. The flow will be streamlined from users -> TravaGPT -> Trava Finance.
**Second Question: TravaGPT has undergone many major upgrades to reach the current version V3.0. So what is special about TravaGPT V3.0?**
Well, TravaGPT has entered Version V3.0, which integrates with Smart Wallet and automates popular actions on Trava Finance.
At present, you can ask TravaGPT to do actions in Trava Finance with Smart Wallets as follows:
➡️ Lending Pools: Deposit, borrow, repay, withdraw.
➡️ Trava Staking: Stake, withdraw, claim reward.
➡️ Trava governance: Create lock, increase amount, increase unlock time, withdraw, merge, compound.
When you try this version, you can see significant improvement in experience:
✅ Provides real-time information for tokens, defi applications
✅ Easily execute transactions within Trava ecosystem by natural language, saving time since users don’t need to go through each application to execute the corresponding transactions
Especially, we have updated a mini assistant in TravaGPT to help quick transfer between your wallet and smart wallet.
👉 So don’t forget to give it a try: https://app.trava.finance/gpt
**Third Question: I think that many users are waiting for more improvement and benefits of TravaGPT. So do you have any plans for future development of TravaGPT?**
In the future, we’ll come up with advanced features for TravaGPT:
👉 Collect and analyze real-time news in the blockchain industry to provide deeper insights
👉 Customize recommendations using the user’s assets for a personalized experience
Everything is waiting ahead, so stay tuned with us for a greater experience!
 
The ongoing incentive program for TravaGPT
**Fourth Question: Currently, Trava is running an incentive program for TravaGPT V3.0. Could you please share with us the objective for this campaign?**
The official name of TravaGPT V3.0’s incentive program is “Easy Integration, Abundant Rewards”
This campaign plays an important role in perfecting TravaGPT. It aims to help users get used to the new updates of our chatbot and provide them with real benefits.
After the campaign, we hope that Trava users will adopt a handy way of using Trava products: ⚡** _ask TravaGPT to do actions in Trava Finance_** ⚡
**Fifth Question: So how can we participate in this campaign and are there any notices to keep in mind?**
To join TravaGPT V3.0’s incentive campaign, you need to have 2 things:
**_1. TravaGPT using permission_**
Anyone who holds $5 Trava/vTrava/rTrava/staked Trava/staked rTrava can use TravaGPT: https://app.trava.finance/gpt
** _2. A Smart Wallet:_**
Create your smart wallet here if you haven’t had it yet: https://app.trava.finance/station
Next, you just need to do a simple thing:
**_asking TravaGPT_** _to deposit/ stake with_** _Smart Wallet_** _in Trava Finance lending pool/ Trava Staking and Trava Finance._
⚠️ Especially, remember to ensure this NOTE:
When you stake/ deposit in Trava pools/vaults, you’ll have your own APR reward and PLUS 20% of the APR. HOWEVER:
✅ Leaving the reward in the vault until the campaign ends, you will earn an extra 20% APR.
❌ Withdrawing the reward before the campaign ends, you will NOT receive that extra 20% APR.
**Sixth Question: Many users are still confused a little bit about the Rewards of the campaign, especially the 20% APR PLUS. Could you give us a clear explanation for those rewards?**
The 20% APR PUS means that you will have an additional 20% of the APR you have when depositing/staking in Trava pool/vault.
To make things simple, I will give you the formula for this reward:
**_APR + (20% * APR)_**
For example, when you stake tokens in Trava Staking and have 4.5% APR. In this campaign, you will not only have that 4.5% APR but also an additional 20% of that APR, which is 0.9%
Remember that you also have Extra Rewards and Lottery Rewards, alongside the 20% APR PLUS.
👉 So let’s join us and get yourself in this LEADERBOARD:

{ "number_of_documents": 5, "results": [ { "content": "**Introduction to Vote Locking mechanism**
Trava & rTrava holders can vote-lock their tokens into the Trava Governance to receive veTRAVA, which holds voting power. The longer they lock, the more voting power they possess. Vote locking allows you to vote in governance and receive rewards from special incentive programs.
 

**What is veTRAVA?**
veTRAVA stands for voting escrow Trava. It is an ERC721 token that acts as evidence of your locking token in the governance module. Every time users create a new lock, they receive a veTRAVA token, storing their locked balance, unlock time, and rewards amount.
The longer you lock your tokens, the more voting power you have (and the bigger incentive you can earn). For example, you can vote lock 1,000 TRAVA/rTRAVA for a year to have 250 voting power. Each token locked for four years is equal to 1 voting power.
The number of voting power you will receive depends on your locked balance & unlock time. 
The minimum locking time is one week, and the maximum locking time is four years.
Your voting power gradually decreases as your escrow tokens approach their lock expiry. The graph on Locker UI from Governance Portal illustrates the decrease process.
 

**What can we do with veTRAVA?**
While holding veTRAVA, you can vote for proposals to change the protocol with your voting power and earn rewards from incentive programs. Currently, veTRAVA holders will earn weekly rewards emission in Trava based on their voting power percentage. There will be proposals to enable sharing fees from protocol or boost rewards in the lending pool in the near future to enrich the veTRAVA incentive program.
 

**Why do we need veTRAVA?**
Firstly, veTRAVA represents the vote locking mechanism, which helps the protocol focus on encouraging ones who show strong commitment.
Secondly, veTRAVA is designed as an ERC721 token, which opens a future secondary marketplace to avoid the decrease of liquidity on the market because of locking the Trava token.
 

**How can I get veTRAVA?**
You can go to our Locker UI in Governance Portal to create a new veTRAVA lock.
Here is the link to our user guide.

Introduction To The rTRAVA Bridge
 
** _What is the rTRAVA Bridge, and why do we need it?_**
There are many blockchain networks and cryptocurrencies that use different blockchain technologies. As in the Trava Lending pool, there are over 15 types of cryptocurrency on three chains, consisting of BSC, Fantom, and Ethereum.
Usually, exchange across different blockchains for cryptocurrency is possible without a cross-chain bridge. However, it is very expensive and time-consuming to do so. That’s why we need a bridge that enables users to transit their tokens easier and faster at a low cost.
For now, Trava.finance has already opened a bridge that allows users to transfer their TRAVA tokens from Fantom to BSC and vice versa. However, given the increase of the rTRAVA utilities, we are pleased to introduce the rTRAVA bridge that helps our users to exchange rTRAVA tokens from Fantom and Ethereum to BSC.
 
**What benefit does the rTRAVA bridge bring to the whole ecosystem?**
As mentioned, users can transit rTRAVA tokens from Fantom and Ethereum to BSC easier and cheaper with the rTRAVA bridge.
By doing that, there are more chances for them to participate in various programs on the BSC network, especially in locking their tokens in the Trava governance vault to attain voting power and rewards.
To be more specific, in Trava Governance, the decision-making power of users corresponds with the volume of TRAVA, rTRAVA, and LP TRAVA/BNB they lock in the Trava Governance vault.
At first, the voting power attained from locking TRAVA and rTRAVA is the same. However, there will be some differences between these two that locking rTRAVA will get more significant power in the future. Thus, locking rTRAVA seems to be a smart choice to improve the influence in the ecosystem quickly.
Nevertheless, the Trava Governance vault is implemented on the BSC platform that stops users from locking rTRAVA tokens.
By implementing the rTRAVA bridge, users now can effortlessly transfer rTRAVA from Ethereum and Fantom to BSC, lock them then attain both rewards and decision-making power.
The rTRAVA Bridge
 
**How does it work?**
As mentioned, the rTRAVA bridge makes the token transition process quicker and effortless. When transit your rTRAVA tokens through the bridge, you only need to pay a small amount of bridge fee and follow some particular rules.
Two options relating to the parameters of the rTRAVA bridge are shown in the table below. Thus, a voting snapshot will soon be opened for our community to choose which one should be officially applied.
 1. _Delay time_**:** The period you need to wait for implementing the transaction.
 2. _Bridge Fee_ : The fee (in TRAVA) you need to pay for each transaction using the rTRAVA bridge.

Governance overview

 *", "image_ids": [], "filename": null, "url": "https://app.trava.finance/station/junction", "rrf_score": 0.08333333333333333 }, { "content": "Figure 5: TRAVA Token Overview
The native digital cryptographically-secured fungible token of TRAVA.FINANCE (Trava token) is a transferable representation of attributed governance and utility functions specified in the protocol/code of TRAVA.FINANCE, and which is designed to be used solely as an interoperable utility token on the platform. Trava token is issued based on Binance Smart Chain’s BEP20 standard.
Trava token is a functional utility token which will be used as the medium of exchange between participants on TRAVA.FINANCE in a decentralised manner. The goal of introducing Trava token is to provide a convenient and secure mode of payment and settlement between participants who interact within the ecosystem on TRAVA.FINANCE, and it is not, and not intended to be, a medium of exchange accepted by the public (or a section of the public) as payment for goods or services or for the discharge of a debt; nor is it designed or intended to be used by any person as payment for any goods or services whatsoever that are not exclusively provided by the issuer. Trava token does not in any way represent any shareholding, participation, right, title, or interest in the Company, the Distributor, their respective affiliates, or any other company, enterprise or undertaking, nor will Trava token entitle token holders to any promise of fees, dividends, revenue, profits or investment returns, and are not intended to constitute securities in Singapore or any relevant jurisdiction. Trava token may only be utilised on TRAVA.FINANCE, and ownership of Trava token carries no rights, express or implied, other than the right to use Trava token as a means to enable usage of and interaction within TRAVA.FINANCE.
Trava also provides the economic incentives which will be distributed to encourage users to contribute to and participate in the ecosystem on TRAVA.FINANCE, thereby creating a mutually beneficial system where every participant is fairly compensated for its efforts. Trava token is an integral and indispensable part of TRAVA.FINANCE, because without Trava token, there would be no incentive for users to expend resources to participate in activities or provide services for the benefit of the entire ecosystem on TRAVA.FINANCE. Given that additional Trava token will be awarded to a user based only on its actual usage, activity and contribution on TRAVA.FINANCE and/or proportionate to the frequency and volume of transactions, users of TRAVA.FINANCE and/or holders of Trava token which did not actively participate will not receive any Trava token incentives.
Trava token is used in 4 main areas: (1) Reward (2) Collateral & Lending (3) Payment (4) Staking:
 1. **Reward:** To incentivise users to provide liquidity to pools, pool owners can set up rewards paid in TRAVA token.
 2. **Collateral and lending:** TRAVA tokens may be used as the basic collateral for loans and mortgages.
 3. **Payment for lending fees:** As the native platform currency, TRAVA tokens may be used to pay for lending fees in TRAVA.FINANCE pools.
 4. **Payment for pool management:** As the native platform currency, TRAVA tokens may be used by pool owners to pay for pool management by TRAVA.FINANCE.
 5. **Payment for auction deposits:** In the NFT auction process, TRAVA tokens can be used as the deposit for purchase transactions.
 6. **Payment for auction organization:** The NFT’s owners (auction organizers) may pay for auction fees with TRAVA tokens.
 7. **Staking for a validator:** The data stored on the knowledge graph chain must be verified by validators. As an indication of commitment and service standard assurance, validators would be required to put up an amount of Trava token as a security deposit (i.e. a "stake") before being entitled to participate in the ecosystem. Where validators commit offences (e.g. incorrect information, unacceptable down-time, or other malicious acts), this stake may be slashed.
 8. **Staking to participate in the governance process:** The Trava token would allow holders to create and vote on on-chain governance proposals to determine future features of TRAVA.FINANCE, with voting weight calculated in proportion to the tokens staked (the right to vote is restricted solely to voting on features of TRAVA.FINANCE; it does not entitle Trava token holders to vote on the operation and management of the Company, its affiliates, or their assets or the disposition of such assets to token holders, or select the board of directors of these entities, or determine the development direction of these entities, does not constitute any equity interest in any of these entities or any collective investment scheme; the arrangement is not intended to be any form of joint venture or partnership).


 Figure 5: TRAVA Token Overview
The native digital cryptographically-secured fungible token of TRAVA.FINANCE (Trava token) is a transferable representation of attributed governance and utility functions specified in the protocol/code of TRAVA.FINANCE, and which is designed to be used solely as an interoperable utility token on the platform. Trava token is issued based on Binance Smart Chain’s BEP20 standard.
Trava token is a functional utility token which will be used as the medium of exchange between participants on TRAVA.FINANCE in a decentralised manner. The goal of introducing Trava token is to provide a convenient and secure mode of payment and settlement between participants who interact within the ecosystem on TRAVA.FINANCE, and it is not, and not intended to be, a medium of exchange accepted by the public (or a section of the public) as payment for goods or services or for the discharge of a debt; nor is it designed or intended to be used by any person as payment for any goods or services whatsoever that are not exclusively provided by the issuer. Trava token does not in any way represent any shareholding, participation, right, title, or interest in the Company, the Distributor, their respective affiliates, or any other company, enterprise or undertaking, nor will Trava token entitle token holders to any promise of fees, dividends, revenue, profits or investment returns, and are not intended to constitute securities in Singapore or any relevant jurisdiction. Trava token may only be utilised on TRAVA.FINANCE, and ownership of Trava token carries no rights, express or implied, other than the right to use Trava token as a means to enable usage of and interaction within TRAVA.FINANCE.
Trava also provides the economic incentives which will be distributed to encourage users to contribute to and participate in the ecosystem on TRAVA.FINANCE, thereby creating a mutually beneficial system where every participant is fairly compensated for its efforts. Trava token is an integral and indispensable part of TRAVA.FINANCE, because without Trava token, there would be no incentive for users to expend resources to participate in activities or provide services for the benefit of the entire ecosystem on TRAVA.FINANCE. Given that additional Trava token will be awarded to a user based only on its actual usage, activity and contribution on TRAVA.FINANCE and/or proportionate to the frequency and volume of transactions, users of TRAVA.FINANCE and/or holders of Trava token which did not actively participate will not receive any Trava token incentives.
Trava token is used in 4 main areas: (1) Reward (2) Collateral & Lending (3) Payment (4) Staking:
 1. **Reward:** To incentivise users to provide liquidity to pools, pool owners can set up rewards paid in TRAVA token.
 2. **Collateral and lending:** TRAVA tokens may be used as the basic collateral for loans and mortgages.
 3. **Payment for lending fees:** As the native platform currency, TRAVA tokens may be used to pay for lending fees in TRAVA.FINANCE pools.
 4. **Payment for pool management:** As the native platform currency, TRAVA tokens may be used by pool owners to pay for pool management by TRAVA.FINANCE.
 5. **Payment for auction deposits:** In the NFT auction process, TRAVA tokens can be used as the deposit for purchase transactions.
 6. **Payment for auction organization:** The NFT’s owners (auction organizers) may pay for auction fees with TRAVA tokens.
 7. **Staking for a validator:** The data stored on the knowledge graph chain must be verified by validators. As an indication of commitment and service standard assurance, validators would be required to put up an amount of Trava token as a security deposit (i.e. a "stake") before being entitled to participate in the ecosystem. Where validators commit offences (e.g. incorrect information, unacceptable down-time, or other malicious acts), this stake may be slashed.
 8. **Staking to participate in the governance process:** The Trava token would allow holders to create and vote on on-chain governance proposals to determine future features of TRAVA.FINANCE, with voting weight calculated in proportion to the tokens staked (the right to vote is restricted solely to voting on features of TRAVA.FINANCE; it does not entitle Trava token holders to vote on the operation and management of the Company, its affiliates, or their assets or the disposition of such assets to token holders, or select the board of directors of these entities, or determine the development direction of these entities, does not constitute any equity interest in any of these entities or any collective investment scheme; the arrangement is not intended to be any form of joint venture or partnership).






Token Allocation
Total Supply — Capped at **5,000,000,000 TRAVA**
We distribute tokenomics with a long-term vision and sustainability for the project. As a DEFI community lending solution, Trava reserves the most tokens (40%) for Liquidity Mining.
Trava believes that Marketing is one of the important criteria for business development. The tokenomics for it will be used to help expand Trava’s awareness, position our products and services, and boost customer acquisition.
The foundation & team play an important role in Trava.Finance’s long-term and sustainable development plan. They will support the company’s operations, future partnerships and other corporate business requirements.
The remaining components are distributed with the goal of ensuring fairness to investors, enhancing the attractiveness of the project, and developing successful products. Liquidity Mining— 40.0%, Marketing— 22.0%, Foundation— 20%, Listing— 2.0%, Team— 10%, Advisors— 6.0%.

Published in
3 min readMay 18, 2022
Share
 _To celebrate the launch of Trava Governance, we would like to open a series of_** _mini-games_** _for the Trava community, which are expected to be a fresh breeze for the whole ecosystem._
_To kick off this series, the Trava Governance Lottery program will be released on May 19, 2022._
Trava Governance — The Lottery Program
 
**What is the Trava Governance Lottery?**
This unique, exclusive event provides users who lock TRAVA, rTRAVA, and LP BNB/TRAVA in the Trava Governance vault the chance to gain rewards.
Depending on the voting power that you own, you can get a list of random numbers. Those who own the lucky number chosen by the program’s smart contract will earn rewards.
 
**How does it work, and how to participate in the lottery?**
To join the lottery, first, you need to lock TRAVA, rTRAVA, or LP BNB/TRAVA to the Trava governance vault. By doing that, you will gain the voting power that helps you to get the random numbers. The more voting power you have, the more numbers you attain. That also means you will have a better chance of winning the lottery if you have more voting power.
Note that, the amount of lottery numbers you have will be determined by the real-time voting power at 3 P.M UTC on 19th, May 2022. You can check this information on our dashboard.
In more detail, the correspondence between the voting power and lottery numbers amount you own is shown below:
Before running the lottery, you can keep track of your lottery number on the dashboard
 * There will be ten rolls in 10 hours (1 roll for each hour).
 * For each roll, the lucky number will be revealed on our dashboard.
 * Users who own this number will gain one ticket to buy a Trava Knight NFT chest that is usually set at 5000 TRAVA.


 
**_To sum up, what do you need to attain the benefits?_**
 * Lock your tokens (TRAVA, rTRAVA, LP TRAVA/BNB) now to get the lucky numbers https://app.trava.finance/governance/locker
 * Update the lucky number for each lottery roll
 * If you are the lucky one, congratulations, you have the chance to earn the NFT ticket
 * If not: Don’t worry, let’s try your luck the next time.


 
**_To sum up, what do you need to attain the benefits?_**

 * If not: Don’t worry, let’s try your luck the next time.



Notes:

 * The lucky number of each roll
 * The wallet address of people who own the lucky numbers
 * The code will be fully revealed


 
**_To sum up, what do you need to attain the benefits?_**

 * If not: Don’t worry, let’s try your luck the next time.



_Lottery number and lucky number:_
 * _Lottery number_ : the number that users get after locking their token to the Trava governance vault, these numbers will be used to participate in the lottery
 * _Lucky number:_ The number that is chosen each hour, people who own these numbers will get rewards.", "image_ids": [], "filename": null, "url": "https://blog.trava.finance/trava-governance-the-lottery-program-3907e18ee35?source=collection_home_page----75e285c42203-----63-----------------------------------", "rrf_score": 0.0625 } ] }

Trava Governance — The Lottery Program
 
**What is the Trava Governance Lottery?**

**How does it work, and how to participate in the lottery?**

    {
      "content": "**Introduction to Vote Locking mechanism**
Trava & rTrava holders can vote-lock their tokens into the Trava Governance to receive veTRAVA, which holds voting power. The longer they lock, the more voting power they possess. Vote locking allows you to vote in governance and receive rewards from special incentive programs.
 

**What is veTRAVA?**
veTRAVA stands for voting escrow Trava. It is an ERC721 token that acts as evidence of your locking token in the governance module. Every time users create a new lock, they receive a veTRAVA token, storing their locked balance, unlock time, and rewards amount.
The longer you lock your tokens, the more voting power you have (and the bigger incentive you can earn). For example, you can vote lock 1,000 TRAVA/rTRAVA for a year to have 250 voting power. Each token locked for four years is equal to 1 voting power.
The number of voting power you will receive depends on your locked balance & unlock time. 
The minimum locking time is one week, and the maximum locking time is four years.
Your voting power gradually decreases as your escrow tokens approach their lock expiry. The graph on Locker UI from Governance Portal illustrates the decrease process.
 

**What can we do with veTRAVA?**
While holding veTRAVA, you can vote for proposals to change the protocol with your voting power and earn rewards from incentive programs. Currently, veTRAVA holders will earn weekly rewards emission in Trava based on their voting power percentage. There will be proposals to enable sharing fees from protocol or boost rewards in the lending pool in the near future to enrich the veTRAVA incentive program.
 

**Why do we need veTRAVA?**
Firstly, veTRAVA represents the vote locking mechanism, which helps the protocol focus on encouraging ones who show strong commitment.
Secondly, veTRAVA is designed as an ERC721 token, which opens a future secondary marketplace to avoid the decrease of liquidity on the market because of locking the Trava token.
 

**How can I get veTRAVA?**
You can go to our Locker UI in Governance Portal to create a new veTRAVA lock.
Here is the link to our user guide.

    {
      "content": "**Mission & Vision**
DAO stands for “Decentralized Autonomous Organization”. Establishing the development of Trava DAO ensures Trava’s team mission:
  * A self-governed protocol, powered by the strength of the Trava community & secured smart contracts.
  * The growth of Trava Ecosystem, a decentralized finance platform with stable and outstanding products.


With that mission in mind, Trava DAO will be implemented & takes over centralized processes gradually with the growth of the ecosystem.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.

**Governance Process**
The governance process consists of 2 continuous processes: off-chain & on-chain.
  * Off-chain process:


In the off-chain process, anyone in the Trava community can raise their opinions and discuss ideas of how the protocol can improve by creating **TRC - Trava Request for Comments** on the Trava Forum.
After an idea is well-formed, a community member can follow our template for **TIP - Trava Improvement Proposal** and post on the forum for details feedback. We recommend off-chain voting (powered by snapshot.org) to gain exposure and rough consensus from the community to increase the chance of succeeding in the on-chain process.
When a TIP gets to its final version, the **DAO Committee** is in charge of the review process and officially proposes on-chain.
  * On-chain process:


When a TIP is proposed on-chain, it becomes transparent on the public blockchain; anyone possessing voting power can directly **vote for or against** this proposal.
After the voting period, a TIP will be **queued and executed** by the public.
The **Security Advisory Board acts as a guardian** to prevent malicious actions and security exploits in this process.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.

**Governance Authority**
In governance version 1, the DAO will have authority over the Trava lending protocol. The community will have to agree on any significant changes or updates through the on-chain process.
 

**Governance v1**
For version 1 of Trava Governance, we present evolution in governance processes with on-chain features enabled.

**Governance Power**
To gain governance power, holders need to lock their Trava or rTrava token in exchange for the veTRAVA token, which holds voting power. This vote locking mechanism encourages users who show a solid commitment to the protocol with more governance power and incentive.

    {
      "content": "**Introduction To The rTRAVA Bridge**
Published in
3 min readMay 21, 2022
Share
Introduction To The rTRAVA Bridge
 
** _What is the rTRAVA Bridge, and why do we need it?_**
There are many blockchain networks and cryptocurrencies that use different blockchain technologies. As in the Trava Lending pool, there are over 15 types of cryptocurrency on three chains, consisting of BSC, Fantom, and Ethereum.
Usually, exchange across different blockchains for cryptocurrency is possible without a cross-chain bridge. However, it is very expensive and time-consuming to do so. That’s why we need a bridge that enables users to transit their tokens easier and faster at a low cost.
For now, Trava.finance has already opened a bridge that allows users to transfer their TRAVA tokens from Fantom to BSC and vice versa. However, given the increase of the rTRAVA utilities, we are pleased to introduce the rTRAVA bridge that helps our users to exchange rTRAVA tokens from Fantom and Ethereum to BSC.
 
**What benefit does the rTRAVA bridge bring to the whole ecosystem?**
As mentioned, users can transit rTRAVA tokens from Fantom and Ethereum to BSC easier and cheaper with the rTRAVA bridge.
By doing that, there are more chances for them to participate in various programs on the BSC network, especially in locking their tokens in the Trava governance vault to attain voting power and rewards.
To be more specific, in Trava Governance, the decision-making power of users corresponds with the volume of TRAVA, rTRAVA, and LP TRAVA/BNB they lock in the Trava Governance vault.
At first, the voting power attained from locking TRAVA and rTRAVA is the same. However, there will be some differences between these two that locking rTRAVA will get more significant power in the future. Thus, locking rTRAVA seems to be a smart choice to improve the influence in the ecosystem quickly.
Nevertheless, the Trava Governance vault is implemented on the BSC platform that stops users from locking rTRAVA tokens.
By implementing the rTRAVA bridge, users now can effortlessly transfer rTRAVA from Ethereum and Fantom to BSC, lock them then attain both rewards and decision-making power.
The rTRAVA Bridge
 
**How does it work?**
As mentioned, the rTRAVA bridge makes the token transition process quicker and effortless. When transit your rTRAVA tokens through the bridge, you only need to pay a small amount of bridge fee and follow some particular rules.
Two options relating to the parameters of the rTRAVA bridge are shown in the table below. Thus, a voting snapshot will soon be opened for our community to choose which one should be officially applied.
  1. _Delay time_**:** The period you need to wait for implementing the transaction.
  2. _Bridge Fee_ : The fee (in TRAVA) you need to pay for each transaction using the rTRAVA bridge.


**_Examples for calculating the bridge fee:_**",

", "image_ids": [], "filename": null, "url": "https://docs.trava.finance/governance/governance-forum", "rrf_score": 0.10555555555555556 }, { "content": "**Trava Meetup — Special Episode — The Next Step In The Trava Ecosystem**
Published in
10 min readMay 16, 2022
Share
We are pleased to recap the special meet-up 3 of Trava.finance. With the presence of Dr. Minh, CEO of Trava Finance, Mr. Thang, CTO of Trava Finance, Ms. Quinn, Marketing Lead of Trava Finance and Ms. Michelle — BD of TechFi, this meetup is a major element of the introduction of Trava’s new phase and a new connection with TechFi, an educational website about crypto and blockchain for investors and developers. The meetup is going to reveal a potential connection in the future between the 2 projects.
The meet-up was divided into 3 parts: (1) Greeting and Introduction, (2) In-depth Discussion, and (3) Ending.
In this Recap, we will try to summarize the most interesting points for you.
 
**Part 1: Greeting and Introduction**
**Ms. Quinn**
Good afternoon ladies and gentlemen. My name is Quinn, Marketing Lead at TRAVA.finance. It’s my pleasure to welcome you here today.
Guys, I am very very excited right now. As all of u know even though there are already 3 meetup episodes, this is the 1st time we have a livestream ever in our community
Joining us today, I’m glad to introduce Dr. Minh and Mr. Thang, our CEO and CTO who are co-founders of Trava Finance. They will walk us through some main points as short-term goals of Trava and the next actions in terms of technology, marketing, and business development plan in this bearish market situation. I’m also super excited because today we got here a secret guest who will be speaking at the last part of the meetup.
There are totally three parts today: Give a brief view at first, then go to detailed information on the Development Plan of Trava Finance. And the last one — I bet u guys will be curious about the guest and listen to sharings about marketing development.
Hi Minh. Hi Thang. How are you doing?
**Dr. Minh**
Hi Quinn, I’m doing great. Really nice to be here with our community and have a close conversation with you guys, especially in the situation that we’re going through all the uncertainties and insecurities appearing recently in the world of cryptocurrency.
**Mr. Thang**
Hi, Quinn. Hi everybody. I’m good, I hope you’re doing well. To be honest, I’ve been a bit busy lately, have been researching and digging deep into the market lately. So it’s really great to sit together and talk with you guys and then walk you through all of the plans we are heading towards. And excited to talk to our guests at the same time.
**Ms. Quinn**
Great! Seems that we are all ready for the discussion with our Knights today.
 
**Part 2: In-depth Discussion**
 
**Part 2: In-depth Discussion**

Topic1: Development plan overview in Tech and Marketing
**Ms. Quinn**
So, as you know, the market situation seems to be rather red and not good for many projects and investors as well. Many investors are panicked since they can not handle the situation, and some start to sell, creating great selling pressure. As the CEO, Minh, can u share to our Knights your strategies to maintain the growth of the project and keep the trust among the community?
**Dr. Minh**
It’s really hard to say what is right to do at that time in this bear market. So I have been listening to the feedback from our community, observing the market, and consulting a lot of individuals who are experienced in cryptocurrency.
In fact, we still try to stick with the initial ideas that follow our long-term vision. At the same time, we also have some modifications to adapt to the bear market at the moment, including some new ideas about technology, marketing, and business.
 
**Part 2: In-depth Discussion**

Topic 2: Technology development plan
**Ms. Quinn**
Great! Talk about the technology development, could you please give users some detailed information
**Dr. Minh**
Actually, we are trying to stick with our long-term vision, but at the same time having some modifications to adapt to the current market.
More specifically, as you know, in the long run, Trava will be the first protocol allowing users to create their own lending pool and build a total decentralized marketplace. We still try to stick with this idea and gradually provide users with unique features related to NFT-collateralization, cross-chain, and data analysis. Et cetera.
At the same time, we also have some modifications to handle the bear market at the moment. We will focus on some main products that actually meet the user’s needs and prioritize creating a thorough information workflow that ensures the community has the needed information. I believe it is an effective way to build trust and engagement in the ecosystem.
For detailed information, I suppose we should listen to Thang.
**Mr. Thang**
Absolutely right, Dr. Minh. It’s better to focus on something that actually works and benefits our users, both old and new ones.
Actually, allowing users to create their own lending pool is our long-term vision. We saw its potential and benefit at first and still believe in its critical role in the ecosystem. In addition, in the future, we also seek to build a decentralized marketplace that users have fully responsible for.
It’s a long way to go. Actually, we are gradually reaching this goal by generating the Trava Governance. You know, a forum and then a locked vault was released, and the Trava Governance will be officially live on 19th May, prepare for it, guys. Moreover, on the way to reaching these goals, we bring users benefits with our unique products. They are about the cross-chain transition, NFT collateralization, and data analysis.
One more thing, I bet most people know that the Trava Ecosystem now includes Trava NFT, TraDAO, and Trava lending pool. The three of them have a close relationship, and all together, they enrich our ecosystem day by day.
**Ms. Quinn**
That’s a strong relationship between Lending Pool and NFT. So what’s about Lending Pool and TraDAO. Is it a closed relationship?
Trava Ecosystem
**Mr. Thang**
Talking about the connection between the Lending pool and TraDAO, we have already calculated the reputation of users in the whole Trava ecosystem, starting with wallet reputation to TRAVA token. Users with high TRAVA and TOD reputations might be of benefit when joining the Investment Committee. The Investment Committee might use our new feature, which will be introduced very soon in the future. And after that, the committee can make the decision to invest the Treasury in the projects that brings the most profit, which can be Trava Lending Pool.
**Dr. Minh**
Seems that the new feature is a useful tool for the TraDAO community to decide on their investment, we are looking forward to it. Can you give us the detail of the relationship between TraDAO and Trava Knight NFT?
**Mr. Thang**
Our new feature is indeed worth waiting for. About TraDAO and Knight NFT, as in the infographic, Investment Committee can mint veTOD, which acts as an NFT. Like veTRAVA, users can buy, sell and auction veTOD on the NFT marketplace. The auctioned veTOD might be used as collateral in Trava Lending Pool. The details of how the Investment Committee can mint veTOD will be announced very soon in the future. So, stay tuned for much excitement ahead.
 
**Part 2: In-depth Discussion**

Topic 3: Marketing development plan
**Mr. Thang**
Personally, I think it’s reasonable when we focus on improving the quality of current features, as well as the communication and understanding among the community. So, Dr. Minh, let’s talk about our marketing and business development plan.
**Dr. Minh**
About Marketing, we have the orientation of growing organic Marketing. We try to organize internal events to improve the communication between the team and our community. These internal events are expected to update our community on what we are doing right now and to enhance trust among our community in this bearish sentiment.
Last but not least, for Business, we also seek in-depth partnerships. On the foundation of the partnerships, we hope to attract more new users to our community. And as you know, this meetup will reveal the future partnership between us and TechFi, a website providing investors and developers with a strong foundation of technology in the cryptocurrency space. I hope this future partnership will be a win-win relationship, TechFi can help us attract users, and we can help TechFi in contributing informative articles or statistics.
**Mr. Thang**
Really insightful indeed! Can you outline the next specific actions for Marketing?
**Dr. Minh**
A lot is worth waiting ahead, Thang. I think I told enough about our brief vision, so now, with specific actions in Marketing, Ms.Quinn, I bet you will be really really ready to share?
**Ms. Quinn**
Well sure.
Maybe many u guys here know that there are 3 main types of media funnels that are really important in digital marketing: owned (our social channels, website, or all the media we created, paid (like KOLs, influencers or ads on Twitter, gg search PPC…) and earned media (Feedback from users themselves or we can say the worth of mouth and the organic effect from the partnership). Reach a diverse audience through Paid Media, create engaging, customer-driven content and solve their problems on Owned Media, then encourage them to share, rate, or support the brand that is earned media.
With the current situation and based on our strategies, we will focus on owned media and earned media at the moment. Focus on the community power right now and discuss more with experts from outside of the team (Like today we have micelle here today). So, for now, it’s necessary to strengthen the communication activities in our community. We will be organizing internal actions, like meetups, community calls, user guide calls, etc., with the live version via Telegram, Discord, or Twitter Space, in order to create more opportunities for our users to directly talk to the product owners of Trava. All in all, we want to focus on customer services and loyal knights. The key or the atom of Trava is technology is the real team with a clear vision no matter how subjective factors, and we will always educate users about that. Thanks guys for always being here and realizing those points and always cheering us.
We hope that with these events, our community will get the latest update on what the team is doing, and we will build a better understanding between team and community through real conversation. I believe communication between team and community is of utmost importance in marketing strategy in this bearish moment.
**Dr. Minh**
Very nice Quinn, specific actions with a clear purpose.
**Mr. Thang**
Indeed. Apart from these internal events, are there any other events with other projects?
**Ms. Quinn**
Nice question Thang, I’m about to talk about the potential partnership between Trava and TechFi. As Dr. Minh mentioned, we will soon collaborate with TechFi, an educational blog targeting people who are interested in blockchain technology and cryptocurrency.
Actually, today, we invite a special guest, Ms. Michelle from TechFi, who will give you more detailed information about this blog and about the supportive relationship between the two of us.
Hi Michelle, I hope you’re doing well.
 
**Part 2: In-depth Discussion**

Topic 4: Business development plan — Partnership with TechFi
**Ms. Michelle**
Hi Quinn, Hi everyone. I’m Michelle from TechFi. It’s such an honor to be here today with you guys and talk about our blog as well as the way to improve the marketing performance of both Trava and TechFi.
Just like Dr. Minh and Mr. Thang have mentioned, the market now is not really good. The investors are losing their trust in some way. That’s why we need a wise vision, quick action, and reasonable solutions for the existing problems. It’s great to hear that you guys are doing well and have a clear vision.
**Ms. Quinn**
Yes. For those who may not know about TechFi could you please give us some information about your blog?
**Ms. Michelle**
Yeah. TechFi is an educational blog for those who care about the world of blockchain. I mean, the investors and developers as well.
To be more specific, we cover a lot of areas related to blockchain technology and cryptocurrency. On our website, you will find this information in the form of news, long-form articles, and personal blogs. So many choices, I would say.
We mainly focus on deep analysis of blockchain projects and blockchain attack cases. By doing that, we provide readers with profound insights into this exciting world which help investors make the right decision and help the developers improve their careers.
**Dr. Minh**
Thank you, Michelle. Actually, I suppose the form of educational blogs is quite common now, and there are several websites out there following this concept. So what differentiates TechFi from others?
**Ms. Michelle**
As I just said, there are two main points we want to focus on, which are the deep analysis of different projects and attack cases. They are our unique selling points, actually.
For now, not many websites provide readers with a deep understanding of these attacks. But with TechFi, each of them will be described and analyzed thoroughly.
Not only investors who care about their money safety but also developers who are working in the field of blockchain security will be interested in these topics.
**Mr. Thang**
It sounds interesting, you know, people tend to think that the world of blockchain and cryptocurrency is full of risks, especially when the blockchain attack happens almost every day around the world. So I think the idea of bringing a better understanding of these attacks is incredible. People are fearful of something mainly because they don’t know about it, so if they know why, how these attacks happen, how to prevent them, and how to handle the bad situation, they may put their trust in the world of cryptocurrency.
**Ms. Michelle**
Exactly! By giving users such useful information like that, we hope to gain their trust from them thus building a strong and loyal community.
 
**Part 3: Ending**
**Ms. Quinn**
Yeah! Thank you Dr. Minh, Mr. Thang and Michelle.
Ladies and gentlemen, I hope that through this close conversation today, you have gained useful information about the next steps of Trava Finance as well as TechFi.
In this bear market, I have to say. It’s quite hard to not be affected by negative feelings. However, we have been through several struggles since the beginning of the cryptocurrency wave. That’s why we have a reason to look at the bright sight. In the last words, thank you all for being here today. See you in the next episode.
**Dr. Minh**
Thank you, hope this meet-up gives the community a better understanding of Trava and our development vision.
**Mr. Thang**
My pleasure to be here today. Thank you.
**Ms. Michelle**
Thank you so much.", "image_ids": [], "filename": null, "url": "https://blog.trava.finance/trava-meetup-special-episode-the-next-step-in-the-trava-ecosystem-fb83878c76dd?source=collection_home_page----75e285c42203-----65-----------------------------------", "rrf_score": 0.08333333333333333 }, { "content": "Trava Governance module aims to bring the protocol to a new level of decentralization - Trava DAO. This module presents an on-chain governance mechanism, where the Trava community can propose and vote on protocol changes & improvements as a way of participating in the protocol’s decision-making process.
In the big picture, there are four essential components in Trava Governance: the Trava community, the DAO Committee, the Security Advisory Board (SAB), and Governance Portal & smart contracts.
 * Trava community: The most valuable resource of ideas, discussions & feedback for protocol changes. Everyone can raise their voice & share their opinion on Trava Forum or any community social channels.
 * DAO Committee: The entrusted individuals in the Trava community to submit proposals after a thorough review with discussion & feedback.
 * Security Advisory Board: The guardian for the protocol’s security when some malicious actions are aimed at the protocol or in unexpected events.
 * Governance Portal & Smart contracts: The autonomous “Hand of the King” consists of governance contracts for on-chain voting and multiple timelocks governing and automating the changes & updates of Trava Ecosystem’s smart contracts. That keeps the governance process public and transparent to everyone.

"content": "Upvote and Downvote in Trava Forum:
Click on the down-ward or upward arrow to show support or disagreement.

Leave a comment on other topic on Trava Forum
Choose the topic you would like to comment on
Click “Reply”

Put in your comment
Click “Submit”

Quote a topic
Choose the topic you would like to comment on
Click “Quote”

Click “Submit”
"}]

Question: How to lock tokens for veTRAVA?
Ground truth (url and content):
[{"url": "https://docs.trava.finance/user-guide/trava-dao-user-guide",
"content": "Select the token you want to lock, input lock amount, and select unlock time to see how many voting power you will have.
Create new veTRAVA lock

1. Click Create Lock, a modal will popup.

2. Select the token you want to lock.
3. Input lock amount.
4. Select unlock time (1 week -> 4 years).
5. Click Create Lock.
6. Your wallet notification will appear, you check again the total amount and gas fee. If they are right, click Confirm.
"}]
